DevStephen Elopers! DevStephen Elopers! DevStephen Elopers! - Steve Ballmer 's exuberance of a few years ago should be adopted by Nokia. Not Microsoft, not Android. Spot On! Peter Welch explained the date change Vermont seeks to enable a swifter move toward a singlepayer system meshes with flexibility conservative politicians might also like because of their opposition to federal control of health care. My argument to them is why not let states experiment? So it is a state's rights argument, Peter Welch said. Bernie Sanders added that the date change wouldn't cost the federal government anything extra, doesn't mention the word singlepayer but would hold states to all the requirements of the law.

If we can't, with what is on offer, find a global star, then I would say we have failed. There is that person or that group sitting in America waiting to be discovered, Simon Cowell said.
